title: philipma1957
author: philipma1957
content: https :// www. bitfufu. com/I can not join them As they do not allow USA to register. With KYC. They are selling bit main coupons at a good price 0.037 cents on the dollar  I could use 100 worth   which is around  2703 discount if they work I would buy another 100 worth  2703 discount  So UK any one .SO I could offer extra if someone wants to buy them and transfer them to me.Going to put this on marketplace.

comments.author: Biffa
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on December 13, 2023, 03:42:13 AMhttps :// www. bitfufu. com/I can not join them As they do not allow USA to register. With KYC. They are selling bit main coupons at a good price 0.037 cents on the dollar  I could use 100 worth   which is around  2703 discount if they work I would buy another 100 worth  2703 discount  So UK any one .SO I could offer extra if someone wants to buy them and transfer them to me.Going to put this on marketplace. I'm in the UK phil, surprised you don't remember  PM me and we can sort something out.The scam side of it seems to be more to do with the fact they offer cloud mining contracts and we all know how they can go.

comments.author: cyc22
comments.body: Hi Philip,  Do you remember me? I sent three mimic S9 hash boards with our chip for your evaluation in 2020. BitFuFu is real cloud mining company and is the subsidary of BitMain. You can find its link website (Strategic Partners of Bitmain) on Bitmain official website and I already mined at BitFuFu from 2022.  Because you helped me before, I would like to help you. I have BitFuFu account. If you need my assist, please PM me. Thanks.
